claim_data.description:
Bonjour,

Suite à une hospitalisation le 16 décembre 2023 pour un examen médical urgent à l’hôpital Saint-Louis à Paris, je n’ai pas pu me présenter à mon vol initialement prévu ce jour-là.

Vous trouverez ci-joint mon certificat d’hospitalisation attestant de ma prise en charge.

Je sollicite donc un remboursement ou, à défaut, l’émission d’un avoir.

Je reste disponible pour toute information complémentaire.

Cordialement,
Kouadri Elhadi Mehdi

authenticity_indicators.quality_assessment: The document appears to be of good quality with clear text and a visible signature and stamp.

llm_decision.explanation: The claim is approved because the claimant provided a valid medical certificate from Hôpital Saint-Louis, which is an image file. The certificate confirms the claimant, Kouadri Elhadi Mehdi, was hospitalized for a medical examination from December 16, 2023, to December 17, 2023. This hospitalization prevented the claimant from taking their flight on December 16, 2023. The certificate has a visible signature and official stamp. The names on the flight booking and the medical certificate match and are fully visible. The timeline is reasonable as the hospitalization occurred on the same day as the flight. Let me verify if Hôpital Saint-Louis exists.  Hôpital Saint-Louis is a real hospital in Paris, France, which supports the authenticity of the document. The claim falls under the Trip Cancellation coverage due to a medical emergency.
reasoning_steps: Verified that the medical certificate is an image file.
Extracted key information from the medical certificate, including patient name, dates of hospitalization, and hospital name.
Verified that the patient name on the medical certificate matches the claimant's name and the name on the flight booking.
Confirmed that the dates of hospitalization coincide with the flight date, justifying the cancellation.
Verified that the medical certificate has a signature and official stamp.
Verified that Hôpital Saint-Louis is a real hospital in Paris.
Determined that the claim falls under the Trip Cancellation coverage due to a medical emergency.

expected_answer.explanation: suspicious dating on the document (17/11/2023 stamp)
